source.sqlReaderQuery:
with cte as(
 SELECT
        [Customer No_],
        [Route Code],
        [Customer Group Code],
        [Item No_],
        [Start Date],
        [DLP Target Qty],
        [Target Qty],
        [End Date],
        [Item Unit of Measure],
        [Pack Group Code],
        [Month],
        [Year],
        [Last Modified],
        [Pack Title],
	'AP' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Cust Target]
where  [Year] = 2021
UNION ALL
SELECT
        [Customer No_],
        [Route Code],
        [Customer Group Code],
        [Item No_],
        [Start Date],
        [DLP Target Qty],
        [Target Qty],
        [End Date],
        [Item Unit of Measure],
        [Pack Group Code],
        [Month],
        [Year],
        [Last Modified],

	   'CHE' as Site_Code
